trans-unit.source: about_Remote_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_Jobs

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Remote Jobs
trans-unit.target: 有关远程作业

trans-unit.source: about_Remote_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_Jobs

trans-unit.source: about_Remote_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_Jobs

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes how to run background jobs on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何在远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: DETAILED DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: A background job is a command that runs asynchronously without interacting with the current session.
trans-unit.target: 后台作业是不与当前会话进行交互的情况下以异步方式运行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The command prompt returns immediately, and you can continue to use the session while the job runs.
trans-unit.target: 命令提示符下立即返回，并且可以继续使用该会话，该作业运行时。

trans-unit.source: By default, background jobs run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，后台作业在本地计算机上运行。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use several different procedures to run background jobs on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 但是，多个不同的过程可用于在远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to run a background job on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 本主题说明如何在远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to run background jobs on a local computer, see about_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在本地计算机上运行后台作业的信息，请参阅 about_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: For more information about background jobs, see about_Job_Details.
trans-unit.target: 有关后台作业的详细信息，请参阅 about_Job_Details。

trans-unit.source: REMOTE BACKGROUND JOBS
trans-unit.target: 远程后台作业

trans-unit.source: You can run background jobs on remote computers by using three different methods.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用三种不同方法，可以在远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: -- Start an interactive session with a remote computer, and start a job in the interactive session.
trans-unit.target: -启动与远程计算机的交互式会话并在交互式会话中启动作业。

trans-unit.source: The procedures are the same as running a local job, although all actions are performed on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 尽管所有操作都都执行远程计算机上则运行本地作业一样的过程。

trans-unit.source: -- Run a background job on a remote computer that returns its results to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: -将其结果返回给本地计算机的远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to collect the results of background jobs and maintain them in a central location on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要收集的后台作业的结果并维护它们在本地计算机上的集中位置，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: -- Run a background job on a remote computer that maintains its results on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: -维护其结果的远程计算机上的远程计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the job data is more securely maintained on the originating computer.
trans-unit.target: 该作业的数据更安全地保持原始计算机上时，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: START A BACKGROUND JOB IN AN INTERACTIVE SESSION
trans-unit.target: 交互式会话中启动后台作业

trans-unit.source: You can start an interactive session with a remote computer and then start a background job during the interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 您可以启动与远程计算机的交互式会话，然后在交互式会话期间启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: For more information about interactive sessions, see about_Remote, and see Enter-PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 有关交互式会话的详细信息，请参阅 about_Remote，并参阅 Enter-pssession。

trans-unit.source: The procedure for starting a background job in an interactive session is almost identical to the procedure for starting a background job on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于交互式会话中启动后台作业的步骤是与用于本地计算机上启动后台作业的步骤几乎完全相同。

trans-unit.source: However, all of the operations occur on the remote computer, not the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 但是，所有操作发生在远程计算机上，而不是本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: STEP 1: ENTER-PSSESSION
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1︰ 输入 PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: Use the Enter-PSSession cmdlet to start an interactive session with a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Enter-pssession cmdlet 启动与远程计算机的交互式会话。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ComputerName parameter of Enter-PSSession to establish a temporary connection for the interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 输入 PSSession 的 ComputerName 参数可用于建立交互式会话的临时连接。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can use the Session parameter to run the interactive session in a Windows PowerShell� session (PSSession).
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用 Session 参数在 Windows PowerShell 会话 (PSSession) 中运行交互式会话。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts an interactive session on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令在 Server01 计算机上启动的交互式会话。

trans-unit.source: The command prompt changes to show that you are now connected to the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令提示符将更改为显示将立即连接到 Server01 计算机。

trans-unit.source: STEP 2: START-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 2︰ 启动作业

trans-unit.source: To start a background job in the session, use the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在会话中启动后台作业，请使用 Start-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command runs a background job that gets the events in the Windows PowerShell event log on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令运行获取 Server01 计算机上的 Windows PowerShell 事件日志中的事件的后台作业。

trans-unit.source: The Start-Job cmdlet returns an object that represents the job.
trans-unit.target: 启动作业 cmdlet 将返回一个对象，表示该作业。

trans-unit.source: This command saves the job object in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将作业对象保存在 $job 变量。

trans-unit.source: While the job runs, you can use the interactive session to run other commands, including other background jobs.
trans-unit.target: 作业运行时，可用于交互式会话运行其他命令，其中包括其他后台作业。

trans-unit.source: However, you must keep the interactive session open until the job is completed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您必须将交互式会话打开直至作业完成。

trans-unit.source: If you end the session, the job is interrupted, and the results are lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果结束会话，该作业的过程中断，并且结果会丢失。

trans-unit.source: STEP 3: GET-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3︰ 获取作业

trans-unit.source: To find out if the job is complete, display the value of the $job variable, or use the Get-Job cmdlet to get the job.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找该作业已完成，显示的值 $job 变量，或使用 Get-job cmdlet 来获取作业。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Get-Job cmdlet to display the job.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 Get-job cmdlet 来显示该作业。

trans-unit.source: The Get-Job output shows that job is running on the "localhost" computer because the job was started on and is running on the same computer (in this case, Server01).
trans-unit.target: 获取作业输出显示该作业在"localhost"计算机上运行，因为该作业，启动了和 （在本例中为 Server01） 所在的计算机上运行。

trans-unit.source: STEP 4: RECEIVE-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 4︰ 接收作业

trans-unit.source: To get the results of the job, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业结果，请使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can display the results in the interactive session or save them to a file on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 可以在交互式会话中显示结果，或将其保存到远程计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the results of the job in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令在 $job 变量获取作业的结果。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the redirection operator (>) to save the results of the job in the PsLog.txt file on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用重定向运算符 (>) 将该作业的结果保存在 Server01 计算机上的 PsLog.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: STEP 5: EXIT-PSSESSION
trans-unit.target: 步骤 5: EXIT-PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: To end the interactive session, use the Exit-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要结束该交互式会话，请使用 Exit-pssession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The command prompt changes to show that you are back in the original session on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令提示符将更改为显示您已在本地计算机上的原始会话。

trans-unit.source: STEP 6: INVOKE-COMMAND: GET-CONTENT
trans-unit.target: 步骤 6︰ 调用命令︰ GET-CONTENT

trans-unit.source: To view the contents of the PsLog.txt file on the Server01 computer at any time, start another interactive session, or run a remote command.
trans-unit.target: 若要随时查看 Server01 计算机上的 PsLog.txt 文件的内容，启动另一交互式会话，或运行远程命令。

trans-unit.source: This type of command is best run in a PSSession (a persistent connection) in case you want to use several commands to investigate and manage the data in the PsLog.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 你想使用多个命令来调查并管理 PsLog.txt 文件中的数据的情况下，此类命令最好运行在 PSSession （持续性连接） 中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about PSSessions, see about_PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: Pssession 的详细信息，请参阅 about_PSSessions。

trans-unit.source: The following commands use the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a PSSession that is connected to the Server01 computer, and they use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Get-Content command in the PSSession to view the contents of the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 New-pssession cmdlet 创建 PSSession 连接到 Server01 计算机，它们使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 PSSession 后，若要查看该文件的内容中运行 Get-content 命令。

trans-unit.source: START A REMOTE JOB THAT RETURNS THE RESULTS TO THE LOCAL COMPUTER \(ASJOB
trans-unit.target: 开始将结果返回给本地计算机的远程作业 \(ASJOB

trans-unit.source: To start a background job on a remote computer that returns the command results to the local computer, use the AsJob parameter of a cmdlet such as the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将命令结果返回给本地计算机的远程计算机上启动后台作业后，使用如 Invoke-command cmdlet 的 cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数。

trans-unit.source: When you use the AsJob parameter, the job object is actually created on the local computer even though the job runs on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用 AsJob 参数时，作业对象并将实际创建在本地计算机上即使作业在远程计算机上运行也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When the job is completed, the results are returned to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 完成该作业后，结果将返回到本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: You can use the cmdlets that contain the Job noun (the Job cmdlets) to manage any job created by any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用包含 Job 名词 (Job cmdlet) 来管理创建的任何 cmdlet 的任何作业的 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Many of the cmdlets that have AsJob parameters do not use Windows PowerShell remoting, so you can use them even on computers that are not configured for remoting and that do not meet the requirements for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 许多具有 AsJob 参数的 cmdlet 不要使用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理，以便即使在未配置为进行远程处理和不符合用于远程处理要求的计算机上使用它们。

trans-unit.source: STEP 1: INVOKE-COMMAND -ASJOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1︰ 调用命令 ASJOB

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the AsJob parameter of Invoke-Command to start a background job on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 Invoke-command 的 AsJob 参数在 Server01 计算机上启动后台作业。

trans-unit.source: The job runs a Get-Eventlog command that gets the events in the System log.
trans-unit.target: 该作业运行可获取系统日志中的事件的 Get-Eventlog 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use the JobName parameter to assign a display name to the job.
trans-unit.target: JobName 参数可用于分配给该作业的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The results of the command resemble the following sample output.
trans-unit.target: 命令的结果类似于下面的示例输出。

trans-unit.source: When the AsJob parameter is used, Invoke-Command returns the same type of job object that Start-Job returns.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AsJob 参数时，Invoke-command 将返回相同类型的启动作业返回作业对象。

trans-unit.source: You can save the job object in a variable, or you can use a Get-Job command to get the job.
trans-unit.target: 可以将作业对象保存在变量中，或者您可以使用 Get-job 命令来获取作业。

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the Location property shows that the job ran on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，位置属性的值显示在 Server01 计算机上运行该作业。

trans-unit.source: STEP 2: GET-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 2︰ 获取作业

trans-unit.source: To manage a job started by using the AsJob parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet, use the Job cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理通过使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 的 AsJob 参数启动的作业，请使用 Job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Because the job object that represents the remote job is on the local computer, you do not need to run remote commands to manage the job.
trans-unit.target: 由于表示远程作业的作业对象是本地计算机上，您不需要运行远程命令来管理该作业。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the job is complete, use a Get-Job command.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定该作业已完成，请使用 Get-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets all of the jobs that were started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令将获取所有当前会话中启动的作业。

trans-unit.source: Because the remote job was started in the current session, a local Get-Job command gets the job.
trans-unit.target: 远程作业已在当前会话中启动，因为本地 Get-job 命令将获取该作业。

trans-unit.source: The State property of the job object shows that the command was completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 作业对象的 State 属性显示该命令已成功完成。

trans-unit.source: STEP 3: RECEIVE-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3︰ 接收作业

trans-unit.source: To get the results of the job, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业结果，请使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Because the job results are automatically returned to the computer where the job object resides, you can get the results with a local Receive-Job command.
trans-unit.target: 因为作业结果将自动返回到计算机的作业对象所在的位置中，您可以使用本地 Receive-job 命令的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the results of the job.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 Receive-job cmdlet 来获取作业的结果。

trans-unit.source: It uses the session ID to identify the job.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的会话 ID 来标识作业。

trans-unit.source: This command saves the job results in the $results variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将作业结果保存在 $results 变量。

trans-unit.source: You can also redirect the results to a file.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以重结果定向到文件。

trans-unit.source: START A REMOTE JOB THAT KEEPS THE RESULTS ON THE REMOTE COMPUTER
trans-unit.target: 启动远程计算机保留结果远程作业

trans-unit.source: To start a background job on a remote computer that keeps the command results on the remote computer, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Start-Job command on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留命令结果，在远程计算机的远程计算机上启动后台作业，请使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在远程计算机上运行 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to run background jobs on multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于在多台计算机上运行后台作业。

trans-unit.source: When you run a Start-Job command remotely, the job object is created on the remote computer, and the job results are maintained on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当远程运行 Start-job 命令时，请在远程计算机上创建的作业对象和远程计算机上所维护作业结果。

trans-unit.source: From the perspective of the job, all operations are local.
trans-unit.target: 从作业的角度来看，所有操作都是本地的。

trans-unit.source: You are just running commands remotely to manage a local job on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您只需运行远程管理远程计算机上的本地作业的命令。

trans-unit.source: STEP 1: INVOKE-COMMAND START-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 1︰ 调用命令启动作业

trans-unit.source: Use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Start-Job command on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在远程计算机上运行 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: This command requires a PSSession (a persistent connection).
trans-unit.target: 此命令要求 PSSession （持续性连接）。

trans-unit.source: If you use the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command to establish a temporary connection, the Invoke-Command command is considered to be complete when the job object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Invoke-command 的 ComputerName 参数来建立一个临时连接，Invoke-command 命令被视为返回作业对象时可完成。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the temporary connection is closed, and the job is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 结果是，临时连接已关闭，并且作业都会被取消。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a PSSession that is connected to the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 New-pssession cmdlet 创建一个连接到 Server01 计算机的 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the PSSession in the $s variable
trans-unit.target: 该命令将 PSSession 保存在 $s 变量中

trans-unit.source: The next command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Start-Job command in the PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 下一个命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 PSSession 中运行 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: The Start-Job command and the Get-Eventlog command are enclosed in braces.
trans-unit.target: 启动作业和 Get-eventlog 命令的命令括在大括号中。

trans-unit.source: The results resemble the following sample output.
trans-unit.target: 结果类似于下面的示例输出。

trans-unit.source: When you run a Start-Job command remotely, Invoke-Command returns the same type of job object that Start-Job returns.
trans-unit.target: 远程运行 Start-job 命令时，Invoke-command 将返回相同类型的启动作业返回作业对象。

trans-unit.source: You can save the job object in a variable, or you can use a Get-Job command to get the job.
trans-unit.target: 可以将作业对象保存在变量中，或者您可以使用 Get-job 命令来获取作业。

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the Location property shows that the job ran on the local computer, known as "LocalHost", even though the job ran on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，位置属性的值显示名为"LocalHost"，即使在 Server01 计算机上运行该作业在本地计算机上运行该作业。

trans-unit.source: Because the job object is created on the Server01 computer and the job runs on the same computer, it is considered to be a local background job.
trans-unit.target: 由于在 Server01 计算机上创建的作业对象，并且作业在同一台计算机上运行，它被视为本地后台作业。

trans-unit.source: STEP 2: INVOKE-COMMAND GET-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 2︰ 调用命令来获取作业

trans-unit.source: To manage a remote background job, use the Job cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理远程后台作业，请使用 Job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Because the job object is on the remote computer, you need to run remote commands to get, stop, wait for, or retrieve the job results.
trans-unit.target: 由于作业对象是远程计算机上，您需要运行远程命令以获取、 停止、 等待，或检索作业结果。

trans-unit.source: To see if the job is complete, use an Invoke-Command command to run a Get-Job command in the PSSession that is connected to the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看该作业已完成，请使用 Invoke-command 命令在连接到 Server01 计算机的 PSSession 中运行 Get-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: The command returns a job object.
trans-unit.target: 该命令返回一个作业对象。

trans-unit.source: The State property of the job object shows that the command was completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 作业对象的 State 属性显示该命令已成功完成。

trans-unit.source: STEP 3: INVOKE-COMMAND RECEIVE-JOB
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3︰ 调用命令接收作业

trans-unit.source: To get the results of the job, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Receive-Job command in the PSSession that is connected to the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业结果，请使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在连接到 Server01 计算机的 PSSession 中运行 Receive-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the results of the job.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用 Receive-job cmdlet 来获取作业的结果。

trans-unit.source: It uses the session ID to identify the job.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的会话 ID 来标识作业。

trans-unit.source: This command saves the job results in the $results variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将作业结果保存在 $results 变量。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Keep parameter of Receive-Job to keep the result in the job cache on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Receive-job 使用 Keep 参数来在远程计算机上的作业缓存中保留的结果。

trans-unit.source: You can also redirect the results to a file on the local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以重结果定向到本地或远程计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses a redirection operator to save the results in a file on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令使用重定向运算符将结果保存在 Server01 计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Jobs

trans-unit.source: about_Job_Details
